main event: A witness observed a brilliant unidentified object emitting a beam of light and hovering about 200 feet away before it disappeared straight up in November 1968.
interesting points: The object had a yellowish-white brightness and produced loud static on the radio, it hovered silently for about 3 to 4 minutes, a second object was detected by the witness moments later, the light beam illuminated trees near the observer's car, the object changed color from white-yellow to a brighter reddish-orange before leaving at high speed.
witness description: The witness was an accounts adjuster from Albany, GA.
